33 
34  struct ReturnAlwaysTrue {
35  bool operator()(double param) const
36  {
37  return true;
38  }
39  };
40 
41  struct Identity {
42  using spectrum_type = Generator::occupancy_spectrum_type;
43  static spectrum_type handle(spectrum_type&& M_j)
44  {
45  return std::move(M_j);
46  }
47  };
48 
49  struct RetrieveLastEmptyUrns {
50  using spectrum_type = Generator::occupancy_spectrum_type;
51  static spectrum_type handle(spectrum_type&& M_j)
52  {
53  auto first = --(M_j.end());
54  while (first != M_j.begin() && *first == 0)
55  {
56  --first;
57  }
58  M_j.erase(++first, M_j.end());
59  return std::move(M_j);
60  }
61  };
62 
97  template
98  <
99  class UnaryPredicate = ReturnAlwaysTrue,
100  class SpectrumHandler = Identity,
101  class Int = cpp_int,
102  class Float = cpp_dec_float_50
103  >
104  class OccupancySpectrumDistribution {
105 
106  using SelfType = OccupancySpectrumDistribution<UnaryPredicate, SpectrumHandler, Int, Float>;
107  using spectrum_type = typename Generator::occupancy_spectrum_type;
108  using support_type = std::vector<spectrum_type>;
109  using probabilities_type = std::vector<double>;
110 
111  unsigned int m_k;
112  unsigned int m_N;
113  UnaryPredicate m_pred;
114  support_type m_support;
115  probabilities_type m_probas;
116  mutable std::discrete_distribution<size_t> m_dist;
117 
118  public:
119 
128  OccupancySpectrumDistribution() = default;
129 
141  OccupancySpectrumDistribution(unsigned int n, unsigned int m, UnaryPredicate pred = UnaryPredicate()) :
142  m_k(n),
143  m_N(m),
144  m_pred(pred)
145  {
146  auto callback = make_callback(m_k, m_N, m_pred);
147  Generator::generate(m_k, m_N, callback);
148  m_dist = std::discrete_distribution<size_t>( m_probas.cbegin(), m_probas.cend() );
149  assert(m_support.size() == m_probas.size());
150  }
151 
160  OccupancySpectrumDistribution(const SelfType&) = delete;
161 
170  OccupancySpectrumDistribution(SelfType&&) = default;
171 
179  SelfType & operator= (SelfType&& ) = default;
180 
189  SelfType & operator= (const SelfType& ) = delete;
190 
200  template<typename Generator>
201  const spectrum_type & operator()(Generator& g) const {
202  return m_support[m_dist(g)];
203  }
204 
212  unsigned int n() const {return m_k; }
213 
221  unsigned int m() const {return m_N; }
222 
230  const support_type& support() const {return m_support; }
231 
239  const probabilities_type & weights() const {return m_probas; }
240 
241  friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, SelfType const& dist){
242  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < dist.support().size(); ++ i)
243  {
244  //os << "P( \t" << dist.support()[i] << "\t) = " << dist.weights()[i] << "\n";
245  auto v = dist.support()[i];
246  os << "P( \t";
247  if ( !v.empty() ) {
248  os << '[';
249  std::copy (v.begin(), v.end(), std::ostream_iterator<unsigned int>(os, ", "));
250  os << "\b\b]";
251  }
252  os << "\t) = " << dist.weights()[i] << "\n";
253  }
254  return os;
255  }
256 
257  private:
258 
259  auto make_callback(unsigned int k, unsigned int N, UnaryPredicate pred){
260  return [this, k, N](spectrum_type&& M_j){
261  auto p = compute_probability(k, N, M_j);
262  if(this->m_pred(p)){
263  this->m_support.push_back(SpectrumHandler::handle(std::move(M_j)));
264  this->m_probas.push_back(p);
265  }
266  };
267  }
268 
269  static Int Factorial(int num) {
270  Int fact = 1;
271  for(int i=num; i>1; --i){
272  fact *= i;
273  }
274  return fact;
275  }
276 
277 
278  static double compute_probability(unsigned int n, unsigned int m, spectrum_type const& m_js) {
279  Float numerator(Factorial(m)*Factorial(n));
280  Float denominator(1.0);
281  int j = 0;
282  for(auto m_j : m_js){
283  denominator *= boost::multiprecision::pow(Float(Factorial(j)),Float(m_j)) * Float(Factorial(m_j));
284  ++j;
285  }
286  denominator *= Float(std::pow(m,n));
287  Float result = numerator/denominator;
288  return static_cast<double>(result) ;
289  }
290 
291  };
